description: Tenable has released a set of vulnerability detection plugins specifically designed to identify systems that are running Citrix NetScaler ADC and Gateway, which are affected by the CitrixBleed vulnerability (CVE-2023-4966). These plugins are a crucial resource for system administrators to rapidly assess their environments for potential vulnerabilities. Utilizing these detection tools will assist teams in remediating identified issues by applying the necessary patches to vulnerable assets promptly. In addition to scanning, these tools may provide insights into the latest threat actor exploit activities, facilitating a more informed response strategy.
